name: JFrogBuildScan
description:
Scan a build with JFrog Xray.
The scanned build must be published to Artifactory prior to scanning, using the 'JFrog Publish Build Info' task.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: xrayConnection
inputs.label: JFrog Xray service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: JFrog Xray service to be used by this task. (This functionality requires version 3.37.0 or above of JFrog Xray)

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build name to scan.
To use the default build name of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.DefinitionName)'.
The build should already be published to Artifactory.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build number
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build number to scan.
To use the default build number of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.BuildNumber)'.
The build should already be published to Artifactory.

inputs.name: allowFailBuild
inputs.label: Allow fail build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unset if you don't wish the audit process to exit with code 3, if a violation matching an Xray policy is found, and the policy includes a 'Fail Build' rule.

inputs.name: vuln
inputs.label: Show all vulnerabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true if you'd like to see an additional view with all vulnerabilities, regardless of the policy configured in Xray. (This functionality requires version 3.40.0 or above of JFrog Xray)
